headline: Argus Research Cuts Price Target on Gen Digital Inc. (GEN) Citing Impact From Tech Selloff
summary: Gen Digital Inc. (NASDAQ:GEN) is among the 10 Best Magic Formula Stocks for 2026. This week, Argus Research cut its price target on the stock to $32 from $35, citing the impact from the tech selloff this year. However, the firm reiterated a Buy rating on the stock. According to a report on TipRanks, Argus […]
